mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board ( title, content, category, hashtag, board_img) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{category}, #{hashtag}, #{board_img});
mapper.select: SELECT A.nick,A.name, B.* FROM t_user as A inner join t_board as B ON A.user_pk = B.user_pk WHERE B.category = '스터디구인' ORDER BY B.board_pk DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{num};
